title: Pure Luck
creator_credit: Peter Wooley, Grania Preston, Lance Hool, Nadia Tass, Timothy Harris, Herschel Weingrod, Sean Daniel, Silver Lion Films, Sean Daniel Company and Universal Pictures
brief_description: An accountant with super bad luck is sent in search of a missing boss’s daughter, also an incredibly unlucky.

constellations_other.name: Nadia Tass
constellations_other.description: Comedic and cult classics take centre stage in Nadia Tass' career.

creator_credit_for_label: Peter Wooley, Grania Preston, Lance Hool, Nadia Tass, Timothy Harris, Herschel Weingrod, Sean Daniel, Silver Lion Films, Sean Daniel Company and Universal Pictures
description: The daughter of a wealthy businessman has disappeared in Mexico, and all the efforts to find her have been unsuccessful. A psychologist, knowing that the girl has an ultra bad luck, persuades her father to send to Mexico one of his employees, an accountant with super bad luck, to find her. Perhaps he will be lucky, and his bad luck could help to find the unlucky girl.
